T02TD1508E:274b-1: shr'i tsakra samba ra aa dve te dhy'a no pa de sha yo ga tsanda l'i /
T02TD1508E:274b-3: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gnyis su med pa'i bsam gtan gyi man ngag rnal 'byor gyi gtum mo ;
T02TD1508E:274b-4: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1508E:274b-5: gang la dmigs pas srid par 'ching ba yi //
T02TD1508E:274b-6: gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog kun gcod cing //
T02TD1508E:274b-7: rnam par mi rtog ye shes mchog 'char ba'i //
T02TD1508E:274b-8: gnyis med rtse yi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1508E:274b-9: gang zhig goms pas sa gsum ma lus pa'i ;
T02TD1508E:274b-10: / rang bzhin bde ba chen po rtogs 'gyur ba'i //
T02TD1508E:274b-11: rang rig ye shes bde chen gcig pu ba //
T02TD1508E:274b-12: gang la brten nas rtogs pa'i man ngag bshad //
T02TD1508E:274b-13: srid pa'i btson rar gzung 'dzin 'ching ba yi //
T02TD1508E:274b-14: bcing bas bcings sdug mgon med gyur pa la //
T02TD1508E:274b-15: snying rje'i rlan gyis nye bar bsgos pa yi //
T02TD1508E:275a-0: @275a * // yang dag byang chub sems ldan dbang bskur bas //
T02TD1508E:275a-1: yid 'ong khang par bde ba'i bstan gnas te //
T02TD1508E:275a-2: lha yi bsam gtan mchog la rab gzhol ba'i //
T02TD1508E:275a-3: lus gnas thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin can //
T02TD1508E:275a-4: spyi po lte bar gnas pa'i rtsa 'khor lo //
T02TD1508E:275a-5: gang la bcu drug thog mar yi ge thig ler ldan //
T02TD1508E:275a-6: dro ba'i bzhi pa gzhom med rang bzhin can //
T02TD1508E:275a-7: aa wa dh'u t'i kun nas sprel ba yi //
T02TD1508E:275a-8: 'khor lo'i dbus gnas byang chub yi ge thig le la //
T02TD1508E:275a-9: rtses gcig yid kyis 'byung dang 'jug spangs te //
T02TD1508E:275a-10: drod dang du ba 'thul dang 'bar ba las //
T02TD1508E:275a-11: rlung bral mar me 'bar ba'i rtse lta bu //
T02TD1508E:275a-12: glog gi 'od ltar kun nas gsal ba'i gzugs //
T02TD1508E:275a-13: gyen 'gros steng gi 'khor lo'i dbus gnas pa'i //
T02TD1508E:275a-14: gzhom med sa bon nham yig bzhu byas te //
T02TD1508E:275a-15: gang la brten nas ye shes mchog skye ba'i //
T02TD1508E:275a-16: byang chub rang bzhin 'o ma'i rgyun 'bab pas //
T02TD1508E:275a-17: gang du thabs dang shes rab 'dres gyur pa //
T02TD1508E:275a-18: de ru gnyis med ye shes skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1508E:275a-19: rang gis rang rig pa yi ye shes mchog / rtog ge rnams kyis brtag pa'i yul min zhing //
T02TD1508E:275a-20: brjod bral ye shes lkugs pa'i rmi lam dang //
T02TD1508E:275a-21: ji ltar gzhon nu ma yi dbang po gnyis //
T02TD1508E:275a-22: 'dus las myong ba'i bde ba ji bzhin pa //
T02TD1508E:275a-23: de bzhin rang rig ye shes skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1508E:275a-24: gang tshe skyes pa'i bde ba che goms pas //
T02TD1508E:275a-25: de las gzhan pa'i dngos po mthong med cing //
T02TD1508E:275a-26: sna tshogs snang ba'i dngos 'di ma lus pa //
T02TD1508E:275a-27: rang bzhin bde ba chen por 'char bar 'gyur //
T02TD1508E:275a-28: de tshe mig sogs dbang po'i yul snang ba'i ;
T02TD1508E:275a-29: / gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos 'di ma lus pa //
T02TD1508E:275a-30: sgyu ma smig rgyu dri za'i grong khyer dang //
T02TD1508E:275a-31: bar ma'i srid dang chu yi zla ba dang //
T02TD1508E:275a-32: snang brnyan seng ge zla ba'i grong bzhin du //
T02TD1508E:275a-33: ma lus rang bzhin gcig pa mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD1508E:275a-34: de tshe thog srid pa'i btson ra ru //
T02TD1508E:275a-35: bsags pa'i 'ching ba ma lus kun bcad nas //
T02TD1508E:275a-36: gnyis med ye shes bde ba chen po yi //
T02TD1508E:275a-37: go 'phang bla na med pa thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1508E:275a-38: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gnyis su med pa bsam gtan gyi man ngag / rnal 'byor gyi gtum mo /
T02TD1508E:275b-0: slob dpon chen po dge ba'i mgon pos mdzad pa @275b rdzogs so /
T02TD1508E:275b-2: // / bal po'i pandi ta b'a g'i shva ra dang lo ts'a ba a'a ts'a rya mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis ba sgyur ba'o//
